text.1:
One verse ( Job 37:21 ) states, "And now they do not see light, it is brilliant (Bahir) in the 
skies... [round about God in terrible majesty]."
text.2:
Another verse, however, (Psalm 18:12), states, "He made darkness His hiding place." It is 
also written (Psalm 97:2), "Cloud and gloom surround Him." This is an apparent 
contradiction.
text.3:
A third verse comes and reconciles the two. It is written (Psalm 139:12), "Even darkness is 
not dark to You. Night shines l ik e day â€” light and darkness are the same."
